item.description:
Note 1 p.m. start time (rather than noon).

Swap theme #1: Uncharted waters

Swap theme #2:  Make collage cards. These can be based on technique demonstrated at September Meetup (torn glossy and matte papers laid down in strips, alternating with masking tape, then painted, then cut up into ATCs) OR they can be other collage cards as long as they use torn strips of glossy paper, preferably (but not necessarily) painted to create backgrounds.

Swap theme #3: HALLOWEEN! (See the Message Board for info on this special swap)

Activity: Something scary in honor of Halloween: DRAWING! We'll explore techniques to make drawing a little less frightening and a little more exciting!
item.how_to_find_us: Use door off parking lot (toward back of building)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ October Meetup in Natick: Saturday, 10/27
